name: icanhazdadjoke
description: The largest collection of dad jokes on the internet

joke: Did you hear the one about the guy with the broken hearing aid? Neither did he.
What do you call a fly without wings? A walk.

What's the worst thing about ancient history class? The teachers tend to Babylon.

joke: How much does a hipster weigh? An instagram.
How did the hipster burn the roof of his mouth? He ate the pizza before it was cool.

joke.joke: What is a centipedes's favorite Beatle song?  I want to hold your hand, hand, hand, hand...
